price: 20. Awood iyo meeqaan sare ku leh (Alle) agtiis, Rabbiga Carshiga Weyn,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
